name: Cat Brawl
description:
Cat Brawl

You wandered into the wrong tavern, and now the patrons are fighting to claim the bounty on your head! Try to survive for 15 rounds and make it out alive.

Pick up potions to refill your health, and have some drinks to keep you agile. Be careful though! Drink too much, and you might end up passing out!

Controls:

  • WASD -> Movement
  • Space -> Dash
  • Mouse Button 1 -> Attack

A game developed by a GameDevTécnico team for the Indie Tales Jam 2021. 

Developed by:

  • Andreia Santos: Art
  • Eduardo Barrancos: Programming
  • Pedro Godinho: Programming
  • Tomás Nascimento: Programming
